class APIClient[source]

APIClient(token=None, auth_code=None, redirect_uri=None, on_token_refreshed=None, on_token_failed=None)

API Client that enables to authenticate and connect to the Artemis API. You need to create an instance of the client to be able to interact with the API

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

APIClient.set_url[source]

APIClient.set_url(url)

Process a url and sets it accordingly for the API calls. The base_url and the url_prefix will be concatenated (preceed) the url

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

APIClient.get[source]

APIClient.get(url)

Performs a GET request for the url

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

APIClient.post[source]

APIClient.post()

Performs a POST request for the url

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

APIClient.delete[source]

APIClient.delete()

Performs a DELETE request for the url

{% endraw %}
